column2: an A.M. Eatery////I had the B.E.A.T. Sandwich for my meal. The hash browns are literally the best I've EVER had. The sandwich was very good
column3: but the ciabatta bread was suppose to be toasted and it wasn't. It also said on the menu that it came with a side of black beans and I never saw any beans on my plate (which is fine
column4: but the menu said that came with it). It also had barely any egg for how big the sandwich is. The bacon is super crispy and delicious though.
